title.rendered: Top 3 Ways ChatGPT Could be Saving Your Business Time and Money and How to Master Them

content.rendered:
Curious how you can get ChatGPT working just how you’d like?

Ignite your business potential with EOS

When generating content through ChatGPT, many business owners, HR directors, operations directors, and even sales and marketing execs have found the output of ChatGPT a little less than…shall we say, human?

DO NOT DESPAIR!

AI tools like ChatGPT are going to give you generic and stiff content if you are not feeding it properly.

Curious how you can get ChatGPT working just how you’d like?

Watch the webinar to discover the top 3 things you can be doing right now with ChatGPT to save your business time, money and deliver excellent results.

In this webinar you’ll learn:

  • How to build personas in ChatGPT
  • How to engineer prompts to get exactly what you need
  • How to feed ChatGPT so it thinks and responds with content and a voice that’s on brand for your organization

 

Walk away with recipes to create content immediately as we unveil how to balance the perfect human/ChatGPT mix to create:

  • Client case studies
  • Webinar content
  • HR recruiting job descriptions

 

Don’t miss this opportunity to revolutionize your approach to ChatGPT and propel your productivity to new heights of success!

About Our Speakers:

Shawn Brown (President) and Ted Hulsy (CRO) each have over twenty years of experience helping sales, marketing, and operations teams improve productivity and results. They will share real-world examples of how small businesses are leveraging ChatGPT to boost productivity and performance.

excerpt.rendered: When generating content through ChatGPT, many business owners, HR directors, operations directors, and even sales and marketing execs have found the output of ChatGPT a little less than…shall we say, human?
